Summary: Large, round ball of white light that had what looked like a spot light shining down on the mountain.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I (including my mother) were sitting on our back deck enjoying a campfire and looking at the stars. It was somewhere right around 9 PM and my son said "momma, look up at that light". We looked up to see what looked almost like a helicopter search light only a lot bigger and it was coming from a large ball of white light. My husband is a private pilot and I know from flying with him for over 20 years, that was this was not a plane or helicopter. There were no emergency lights, nothing, and this was higher than a helicopter could fly and much bigger. It hovered for about a minute or so and then started to go straight up in the sky. It left behind a misty type light as it ascended but there wasn't a cloud in the sky! This object did not make any noise either, it was dead silent. I posted my story on Facebook to friends and have had several responses back that other people in several nearby towns saw what we did tonight. I would love to know if anyone else out there saw it or if there was a documented flight mission, etc over our area that could explain it. Never in my life have I seen anything like this. If anyone would like to contact me, they are free to do so. I am excited to hear stories of anyone who saw what i did tonight. Sincerely, Lisa Perry
